item.title: New Book – vSphere 4.0 Quick Start Guide released
item.description: The vSphere Quick Start guide is released and available from Amazon. This guide is written by 6 virtualization guruâ€™s named: Duncan Epping Alan Renouf Dave Mishchenko Bernie Baker Thomas Bryant Stewart Radnidge The book summary from Amazon: vSphere 4.0 Quick Start Guide continues from an idea started several years ago by a few engineers.
